title.rendered: Hexagon Sun T-shirts now available on Mercht

content.rendered:
Following the success of an initial print run on Cotton Bureau in the US, my Boards of Canada inspired “Hexagon Sun” T-shirts are now available for a limited time via Mercht, here in the UK.

Pre-order Hexagon Sun T-shirts from Mercht

Get ’em while they're hot!

Update: This campaign has now ended. If you missed your chance, there's still hope. Head over to Cotton Bureau and request a reprint:

https://cottonbureau.com/products/hexagon-sun
